name: Distant Grave
description:
Distant Grave is a short parkour game, you play as a character who's father has just died, and you follow a path that he had instructed you to follow, with a few plot twists.

Recommended Specs:

GPU: Nvidia GTX 1660ti / Amd 5500xt or above 

CPU: Intel i3 10th gen / Amd ryzen 3 3100 or above
